name: Body, Make a Machine
description:
A collection of unfinished interactive fiction games, created from 2017 - 2020 by Oma Keeling.

Featuring 10 unfinished projects:

5 Twine Stories - 

  • Rainwalker - on a rainy night, somewhere else
  • LPV: Quantum Detective - a biological outbreak, a plucky investigator, in space
  • Second Guard - death is not permitted
  • On the Inside - your brother has left you here
  • William Tell's Kid - up against the tree

5 Unity 3D games -

  • Shutdown - Tisha Towlidge runs a VR therapy space for prisoners, until she doesn't
  • Terrible Sports Game - it's all about sports 
  • Hollow Inside - the rooms inside the place
  • Millennium Pit - a hole opened up in the icy plains
  • Thick Blue Tongue - as described
